title: UFC : most knockdowns landed by fighters worldwide as of March 2020
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of knockdowns landed in each Month on the y axis.
Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed and Thiago Alves has the lowest Number of knockdowns landed.
Month Donald Cerrone has 1.54 times more Number of knockdowns landed than Month Thiago Alves which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of knockdowns landed for 10 number of Months.
Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed and Thiago Alves has the lowest Number of knockdowns landed.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of knockdowns landed in each Month on the y axis.
Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed and Thiago Alves has the lowest Number of knockdowns landed.
Month Donald Cerrone has 1.54 times more Number of knockdowns landed than Month Thiago Alves which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of knockdowns landed for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of knockdowns landed 20.0 is found at Month Donald Cerrone and the minimum is found at Thiago Alves where Month is 13.0.
The highest Month Donald Cerrone has 7.0 more Number of knockdowns landed than the lowest Month Thiago Alves.
Month Donald Cerrone is higher than any other Months with value 20.0, followed by Jeremy Stephens, and Jeremy Stephens. Down to Month Thiago Alves with the lowest value 13.0.
The Number of knockdowns landed has lowered over the past 10 Months.
Month Junior Dos Santos, Chuck Liddell, Lyoto Machida, and Mauricio Rua have the same Number of knockdowns landed.
The average Number of knockdowns landed in all 10 Months is 15.1.
The Number of knockdowns landed is 151.0 if we add up values of all Months.
